response.overview: Jack Napier's signature line for Vouyer Media, "It's Big, It's Black, It's Jack," has won AVN's coveted Best Interracial Series award for the last three years running. Now, fresh from this stunning triple-threat victory, the tireless performer/director is ready to take things to the next level with the exciting, all-new interracial series "Jack Napier's Keepin' It Real." The focus here is on youth as Mr. Napier samples the charms of such delectable nineteen year old newcomers as Tristyn Kennedy, Torrie Madison, and Giselle Leon. Not to be outdone, sexy vixens Heather Starlet and Jessi Andrews round out one of the finer casts of Jack's career. Shot and edited in 16x9 HD, "Jack's Napier's Keepin' It Real" is packed with same hot interracial action and lighthearted fun that's made "It's Big, It's Black, It's Jack" a veritable mainstay at the AVN awards.
response.title: Jack Napier's Keepin' It Real
